page.title: 09CLIMATE
page.content: The climate around South Petherton is quite good. In the summer it is quite hot with little wind and rain. In the Autumn the weather is generally warm with little rain. Winter is usually cold,rainy and windy with frost snow and ice.We hardly ever have deep snow,but we have a lot of ice. In late spring of this year it has been hot.We kept a daily record of weather conditions at school from the 17th April to the 5th June,44% of the days have been sunny,6%of the days have been windy and 10%of the days have been drizzle.The average temperature has been 17.03oC and the the average pressure has been 1005.8 millibars. The highest temperature from the 17th April to the 5th June has been 24oC on the 3rd and 4th of June.
